Thanks, skumelx.  :)

This is actually a re-distribution.  When I first released this here, I didn't have the poster art that it has now, it was incorrectly titled "Tombstone [1993]" as if it were the theatrical release, and I incorrectly marked the Texted language as English when in fact there are no subtitles at all.

And yes, the quality is excellent hehehehe

Nice quility :D ty verry much :D

Though i can't find any swe subs :(

Why did you split the film? If someone is that desperate for a VCD there's plenty of free tools to split it in about 10 seconds. On the other hand, putting it back together seamlessly is a pain in the ass. 

Will keep looking for an intact file.
